21.6 Recurrent Neural Network Models
Long Short-Term Memory networks or LSTMs for short have proven eﬀective on challenging
sequence prediction problems when trained at scale for such tasks as handwriting recognition,
language modeling, and machine translation. For more information on the use of LSTMs
